WRITING.TITLE: The 5 Stages of Debugging -
WRITING.TEXT: **1. Denial**\- This stage includes phrases like "What? that's impossible!" or "I know this will work". **2. Bargaining**\- Programmer starts to bargain with the code - "If i fix this, will you please compile?", as if the code will listen to him. **3. Anger**\- \*hours long profanity\* \*more Profanity\* **4. Depression**\- Hours have gone by as the #160;[\#programmer](https://twitter.com/hashtag/programmer?src=hashtag_click) #160;realizes there's no solution. Programmer becomes sad and listless. **5. Acceptance**\- The programmer finally proclaims - "This is not a bug, It's a #160;[\#Feature](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Feature?src=hashtag_click)" and goes to play some Fortnite.

WRITING.TITLE: Burnout in Software Development: How to Deal With it?
WRITING.TEXT: ***Do you find that you are losing passion for coding?*** ***Do you find the spark of motivation is now missing somewhere for coding?*** ***Are*** ***you overloading yourself with so many tasks but you are not achieving anything? There are so many tabs open in your browser but you can #8217;t concentrate?*** Well, these all symptoms are the sign of burnout in programming. Read more about [Software burnout and how to deal with it!](https://www.subject4400.org/burnout-in-software-development-how-to-deal-with-it/)

Geek Collects the balls
WRITING.TEXT: There are two parallel roads, each containing N and M buckets, respectively. Each bucket may contain some balls. The buckets on both roads are kept in such a way that they are sorted according to the number of balls in them. Geek starts from the end #160;of the road which has the bucket with a lower number of balls(i.e. if buckets are sorted in increasing order, then geek will start from the left side of the road). The geek #160;can change the road only at the point of intersection(which means, buckets with the same number of balls on #160;two roads). Now you need to help Geek to collect the maximum number of balls. #8203; Check here to try out the solution! - gt;[https://practice.subject4400.org/problems/geek-collects-the-balls/0/?problemType=full amp;difficulty\[\]=1 amp;page=1 amp;sortBy=newest amp;query=problemTypefulldifficulty\[\]1page1sortBynewest](https://practice.subject4400.org/problems/geek-collects-the-balls/0/?problemType=full amp;difficulty[]=1 amp;page=1 amp;sortBy=newest amp;query=problemTypefulldifficulty[]1page1sortBynewest)
